${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:BasicEyeContact.NAME: 基础眼神
${modID}:BasicEyeContact.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点格挡，获得 !${modID}:IN! 层 ${modID}:好印象

${modID}:BasicPosture.NAME: 基础姿势
${modID}:BasicPosture.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点格挡，造成 !D! 点伤害

${modID}:ChangeEmotion.NAME: 转换心情
${modID}:ChangeEmotion.DESCRIPTION: 造成等同于格挡值 NL (!D!) 的伤害， NL 消耗
${modID}:ChangeEmotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成等同格挡值 NL [#7fff00]1.1[] 倍 (!D!) 的伤害， NL 消耗

${modID}:CuteGesture.NAME: 可爱手势
${modID}:CuteGesture.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !${modID}:IN! 层 ${modID}:好印象， NL 造成等同于格挡值 NL (!D!) 的伤害 NL 消耗
${modID}:CuteGesture.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得 !${modID}:IN! 层 ${modID}:好印象 ， NL 造成等同于格挡值 NL [#7fff00]1.2[]倍(!D!) 的伤害 NL 消耗

${modID}:Morning.NAME: 早安
${modID}:Morning.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害，获得 !${modID}:IN! 层 ${modID}:好印象
${modID}:Morning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害，获得 !${modID}:IN! 层 ${modID}:好印象
